divs: Sighting DetailsLisbon, February, 2013; 19:40 I was walking towards North direction talking on the phone with a friend from Faro (algarve), when i saw a bright white light moving in the sky (the same intensity of brightness as Venus). Orion was on the sky zenit and the object pass south of the constelation in a straight line 285��� direction. I told my friend and he came out and saw it too. I live very close to the place where the airplanes make the turn to land therefore i know very well identify the pattern of a plane flight and its brightness.During the sighting 3 planes were seen contemporaneously. We were talking about the (R)Evolution ongoing on the planet with the disclosure of some bad actions regarding religion, politics and banking... When he asked, if i do believe on it... they arrived... Me and my friend talked about it while they passed...
